description: This file contains unit tests for authentication stub endpoints in a FastAPI application, verifying behavior when the stub is enabled or disabled.

methods.name: test_auth_debug_returns_principal_when_stub_enabled
methods.description: Tests that the auth debug endpoint returns user principal information when the stub is enabled

methods.name: test_auth_debug_returns_501_when_stub_disabled
methods.description: Tests that the auth debug endpoint returns a 501 status when the stub is disabled
